  • Method Details

    • query

      public boolean query(String... args)
      The query function is used to query the database for a specific entry. The user must provide the name of the table they wish to query, and then specify which column they want to search in, and what value that column should have. For example: "query users username johndoe" will return all entries in the users table where username = johndoe. If no such entry exists, an error message will be printed out instead.
      Parameters:
      args - Pass in a variable number of arguments
      Returns:
      A boolean value

    • challenge

      public boolean challenge(String... args)
      The challenge function is used to challenge a player.
      Parameters:
      args - Pass in an array of strings
      Returns:
      A boolean value

    • get

      public static DictionaryManager get()
      The get function is a static function that returns the singleton instance of DictionaryManager. If no instance exists, it creates one and then returns it.
      Returns:
      The singletone instance of the class

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      The getSize function returns the size of the ArrayList Books.

      The size of the arraylist
